import React from "react"; import { MDBContainer } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; const Form = ({ handleSubmit, clearCart, cart, toggleModal }) => { return (
handleSubmit(e)}>
{cart.cartItems.length !== 0 ? : ''}
); } export default Form;
